discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Also, be aware that because of sensor update throttling, creating sensor update exclusion time blocks that drastically narrow the times during which sensors can receive updates may result in some hosts not receiving updates.

questions.question_text: Which of the following controls the speed in which your sensors will receive automatic sensor updates?
After agent installation, an agent opens a permanent ____ connection over port 443 and keeps that connection open until the endpoint is turned off or the network connection is terminated.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Documentation: Sensor Deployment and Maintenance > Windows > Falcon Sensor for Windows > Title: Allow TLS Traffic para 1

After agent installation, an agent opens a permanent TLS connection over port 443. The connection is kept open until the endpoint is turned off or the network connection is terminated.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct because on the Containment Policy page, you can allow IP addresses over which your hosts will always be allowed to communicate, even if a host is contained.

B is correct

Selected Answer: B
B is correct, that is the whole point of containment

questions.question_text: What is the goal of a Network Containment Policy?

choices.A: Increase the aggressiveness of the assigned prevention policy
choices.C: Gain more visibility into network activities
choices.B: Limit the impact of a compromised host on the network

discussion.content:
